title: Saturn Transit in the 12th House: Solitude, Release, and Closure
summary: When Saturn transits the 12th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, isolation, expenses, and inner discipline become central themes. You are pushed to confront subconscious fears, unfinished karmic matters, and patterns of escape. Progress happens quietly through restraint, spiritual discipline, and acceptance rather than external achievement. Expenses require strict control, especially those linked to health or long-distance matters. This transit prepares you for a new cycle by teaching detachment, emotional maturity, and responsibility toward inner peace.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Need for solitude to regain strength

sections.title: Career
points: Slowdown before a new professional phase

sections.title: Finance
points: Costs related to health or foreign matters

sections.title: Mental & Inner State
points: Letting go of old emotional baggage

closing: Saturn in the 12th house teaches that true strength is built by releasing what no longer serves and mastering the inner world.
